definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: Black and white was changed into multi-colour by her.
sentences.chinese: 她把世界變得多姿多彩。

sentences.english: The Chinese life is colorful with many interesting folkways.
sentences.chinese: 中國人的生活多姿多彩，有許多很有意思的民俗。

sentences.english: Colorfully lit high- risers give off dazzling light in the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 多姿多彩的高樓大廈，在夜色中絢爛奪目。

sentences.english: The richness of mood determines the colorfulness of music.
sentences.chinese: “情”的豐富複雜，決定了“樂”的多姿多彩。

sentences.english: 90 start bell-bottomed trousers' type also becomes colorful.
sentences.chinese: 90年代開始喇叭褲的種類也變得多姿多彩。

sentences.english: The traditional Mid-Autumn Festival, now more colorful.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的中秋節，如今更加多姿多彩。

sentences.english: My life in Mount. Wugui is getting more & more colourful.
sentences.chinese: 我在五桂山的生活才變得多姿多彩。

sentences.english: The original mix of clothing is as multi-colored as a rainbow.
sentences.chinese: 這套服飾搭配就像是多姿多彩的彩虹。

sentences.english: For the design team, the secret was to bring all the richness of city life within.
sentences.chinese: 設計組認爲，祕訣就在於引入多姿多彩的城市生活。

sentences.english: In spring the flowers disclose their colours.
sentences.chinese: 花朵在春天顯露其多姿多彩。

sentences.english: How can one experience life in all its diversity?
sentences.chinese: 一個人怎樣能經歷生命的多姿多彩呢？

sentences.english: 44-If you never try something new, your life' s story will be boring.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不嘗試新事物，你的人生不會多姿多彩。

sentences.english: The Inner Harbour is a very colourful place.
sentences.chinese: 維多利亞內港是個多姿多彩的地方。

sentences.english: It is dream that gives us power and makes our lives colorful.
sentences.chinese: 夢想也給了我們力量，讓我們的生活多姿多彩。

sentences.english: This fact glossed over the colorful foretime of Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 這一事實卻掩蓋了新加坡多姿多彩的過去。

sentences.english: Historical and cultural homeland, you are so colorful, so that .
sentences.chinese: 祖國的歷史文化，你是這樣多姿多彩，令魂牽夢縈。

definition: elegant and graceful posture/splendid, full of content
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
in different poses and with different expressions/in thousands of postures (idiom)
bright and multicolored/of rich variety/(fig.) dazzling/glitzy
see 五彩繽紛|五彩缤纷[wu3 cai3 bin1 fen1]
